basics.name: Ruth John
basics.label:
Freelance Creative Technologist and Consultant Front End Developer  |  
Google Developer Expert
basics.summary:
Ruth has been working for over a decade in web/software/application design and development, with a current position in research and development where she excels with her broad range of skills in different areas of technology. Anything ranging from online to media to communications.

Having worked in creative agencies, media companies, telecommunications and startups, Ruth boasts a vast range of experience in digital. Starting her career in design and front end development her education and skills in electronics, music technology and computer arts has led her comfortably into research and development, where she consults and manages both within her team and elsewhere within the wider business. Her current position has seen her innovate and prototype new ideas, to improve customer experience and business processes within a telecommunications company; leading projects and teams to explore better digital experiences for both customers and staff. 

“I love the challenge innovation brings. To keep up to date with emerging technology but make it relevant to the user, to put it in context.”

Ruth has experience managing projects and teams, as well as designing and developing, with skills including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Adobe CS, wire-framing, accessibility and usability, user testing, branding, as well as setting and managing coding standards. She also has server side coding experience, with node, PHP, Ruby, SQL and MongoDB, and hardware experience, building electronic prototypes.

work.position: Senior Creative Technologist, The Lab, O2.

work.summary: Employed to create a modular design implementation for a client website and help integrate into their .net back end.

Covering for the senior front end developer role until the company employed a permanent member of staff. I was the go-to developer for HTML(5), CSS(3) and JavaScript. As an agency environment, it was fast paced, varied and required good personal management to meet strict deadlines.

Managed the delivery of front-end work for all company projects. I lead the team to produce UI/UX design, mark-up, styling and implementing JavaScript where necessary. Additionally I was tasked with ensuring policy coding standards, accessibility and usability were adhered to.  Implementation was HTML5 and CSS3 and this was integrated with PHP based templates (Zend/.phtml). I also created a CSS framework to be used on all applications, based on the company branding and liaising with the company’s designer, developers and clients.
Managing a build for Secret London, overseeing a team of designers and front end developers for a community project.

Designer/Front End Developer. Designing websites from a brief, with well thought out usability and adhering to brand guidelines. Creating accessible, browser compatible, valid templates, using XHTML and CSS as well as JavaScript and Actionscript. I directed the team to implement HTML5 classes and IDs following the guidelines of Andy Clarke and Jon Tan. Finally using PHP to help integrate them with the company’s own ‘Fig’ content management system, based on the Zend framework. Taking a senior role, I also regularly gain experience mentoring juniors and middleweight designers and developers, leading website builds in large company contracts, working with project/account managers planning projects and estimating billable time, interviewing prospective freelance candidates, revising coding guidelines and standards as well as advising on how to enhance company procedures.

Web Developer. Having established a position as an influential front-end developer within the technical department, and forging close links with the creative department, I successfully and reliably delivered a number of challenging projects within a fast paced agency environment. Many projects were implemented using Symphony CMS, requiring an ability to create modular visual designs, of a pixel perfect standard.

Web Developer/Designer. Employed as a web developer, building community/user based sites using PHP, XHTML, CSS, SQL and JavaScript. Promptly took over the company designer position, undertaking all design for the company including web design and the associated front end development, print work, web banners and adverts as well as logo and branding work. All design work undertaken in Adobe CS, with high level experience in Photoshop and Illustrator.
